title: By the Queene. The Queenes most excellent Maiestie in her princely nature, considering how dangerous a matter it is by continuance of the faire called Bartholomew faire  ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,
notes: Forbidding retail trade at Bartholomew fair because of plague.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
